title: Ethereum Cat Herders Meeting #83
body:
## Date and Time

April 26, 2022, at 15:00 UTC

## Location 

Zoom: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/84834303064?pwd=YTVDNUxvSjEzL1VTOXNoNmI1a2RlZz09

Video at YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCD9iiIwTRtLDYcEWONs2Q3A

## Agenda

New users on ECH Discord and/or contributor's introduction

### 1. Ethereum network upgrades
- [The Merge](https://ethereumcatherders.com/the_merge/)â€Š
  - Mainnet Shadow fork - [Ben's Tweet](https://twitter.com/benjaminion_xyz/status/1517770411035045892), ([Article](https://etherworld.co/2022/04/20/ethereum-mainnet-shadow-forking-an-overview/))
- [Shanghai specs](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/mainnet-upgrades/shanghai.md), [Tracker](https://github.com/ethereum/execution-specs/projects/1)

### 2. Element Finance airdrop [details here](https://mirror.xyz/0x3fcAf7DDf64E6e109B1e2A5CC17875D4a5993F39/bctuLRkf7oBL4mMJ9lPf0y0blFjBDslTUfUL0CEk1gc) and [ELF NFT](https://twitter.com/element_fi/status/1516928237548433408?s=21&t=EMGJTh2kcRzBTshTv_Shwg) 

### 3. New initiatives
- ECH GitHub backup
- dapp usage video series

### 4. Events & hackathon
- [EthPrague](https://ethprague.com/) June 10-12, 2022 
- Devfolio
    - [Manthan](https://manthan.devfolio.co/) - March 30 - May 14, 2022
    - [ETHWMN Fellowship](https://ethwmn.devfolio.co/) 

### 5. ECH updates
- [ECH website](https://www.ethereumcatherders.com/)
- [ECH engineering](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/issues/266) 
  - Need Ruby dev
  - [EIP bot](https://github.com/ethereum/EIP-Bot/issues) & [EIPV](https://github.com/ethereum/eipv/issues)
  - [Learn2Earn](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/L2E)
- Cat blazers 
   - [ECH Podcast](https://open.spotify.com/show/7dgxKMkSyy3HWtQW7OfqXA)
   - ECH Medium to Mirror 
- ECH Operations 
   - [ECH New Joiners Meeting April 2022](https://youtu.be/VOlVHi4qbho)
- [EIP Insight](https://hackmd.io/@poojaranjan/EthereumImprovementProposalsInsight)
- [PEEPanEIP](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL4cwHXAawZxqu0PKKyMzG_3BJV_xZTi1F)  
    - [EIP-4626: Tokenized Vault Standard](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-4626)
    - Upcoming meetings can be found on [PEEPanEIP schedule](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/projects/2)

- [Meeting notes](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1axM1KaKc-GCcoPbAnYTOhgLnxXsBVoO5XRjTN3CLnck/edit#gid=0) and action items for ECH 
  - All Core Dev meeting [notes 136](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/515)
  - Consensus meeting [notes 85](https://github.com/ethereum/pm/pull/513)
  - EIP Improvement Process meeting 54
  - EIP editors apprentice meetings [16 Agenda](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/EIPIP/issues/124)

### 6. Review of outstanding action items from previous ECH meetings
- [Meeting 82](https://github.com/ethereum-cat-herders/PM/blob/master/All%20Ethereum%20Cat%20Herder%20Meetings/Meeting%20082.md)

 Anything else?

#### The date for the next meeting - May 10, 2022.
